Overview.name: Overview0
Overview.content:
OpenCms is a typed content management system. Each resource in the VFS has a specific type and in particular each XML content has a specific type and a configuration that determines how the type and contents of it are displayed in apps, e.g., in the page editor.

To manage your resource types, OpenCms 11 introduces a special app. Here you can add, edit or move resource types. Moreover, you get easy access to all resources of a type present in your current installation and to the schema file for XML contents.

Teaser.name: Teaser0
Teaser.content: Add, move or remove resource/content types on your installation and find out where contents of which type are present.

AlkaconDocumentationTopicFrame.Keywords: resource type, content type, workplace, app, management, modules

Link.LinkText: The concept of content in OpenCms

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: Get some background about content in OpenCms, in particular find out about the use of content types.

LinkDescription.name: LinkDescription0
LinkDescription.content: Find out more about managing modules. This might be relevant since resource types you configure via the app belong to modules.
